mapper.select: SELECT b.boardNo, b.userNo, b.myCourseNo, u.userNick FROM board b LEFT JOIN user u ON b.userNo = u.userNo WHERE b.deletedTime IS NULL AND b.myCourseNo IS NOT NULL ORDER BY b.countLikes DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT p.placeTitle, p.firstImage2 FROM myCourse mc JOIN myCoursePlace mcp ON mc.myCourseNo = mcp.myCourseNo JOIN place p ON mcp.placeNo = p.placeNo WHERE mc.myCourseNo = #{myCourseNo}
